sect2.title: Installation de freetype2
sect2.para: Installez freetype2 en lançant les commandes suivantes:

userinput.command: cp include/freetype/config/ftoption.h include/freetype/config/ftoption.h.orig && sed -e "s%\/\* #define TT_CONFIG_OPTION_BYTECODE_INTERPRETER \*\/%#define TT_CONFIG_OPTION_BYTECODE_INTERPRETER%" \ include/freetype/config/ftoption.h.orig > include/freetype/config/ftoption.h && ./configure --prefix=/usr && make && make install
